name: Save Baby James!
description:
*This is a 10 stage demo of the 45 stage mobile game available now for Android and iOS.

Put your fingers to the test tapping on anything that could harm Baby James as he rolls through the zoo! 

-Stun animals so James can ride on top of them, flip switches, detonate explosives and avoid spikes!

-Open new paths by equipping James with one of 24 costumes including a knight an astronaut,zombie and more!

-Unlock abilities to explore previously unaccessible areas!

-Race the evil baby!

-Start off easy then take on more difficult challenges as things get crazy in this strange zoo!

-2D pixel sprite graphics and hand drawn cartoons!

-Retro soundtrack downloadable from in the game!
